item.description:
The Patriots game will be on, There's only drinks, no food but we can pull together some tables and enjoy.

 

Note, this is linked to the Bunker Hill tour but anyone is welcome and I don't care if you post a picture of your dog or a plant for this one.

 

Keep your own tab and please make sure you tip the waitstaff.

 

Waiters and bartenders make less than $3 per hour so tips are their livelihood, not a bonus. If you can't afford a 20% tip then drink less, drink at home or don't drink!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be taking the water shuttle from Charlestown after the Bunker Hill tour so timing may vary but we'll be there.
item.name: Drinks and Patriots Game after the Bunker Hill Tour: The Landing Bar
